channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog I offer a new *Masks* playbook inspired by Moon Girl & Devil Dinosaur, The iron Giant, Blue Beetle, and Stanley and His Monster as well as riffing on a unique playbook from *The Veil* cyberpunk PbtA rpg.
